rComments: Lectures are often long and boring, but attendance is only mandatory on quiz days. Veenstra himself is literally the nicest teacher ever; he REALLY wants everyone to do well, and gives great help if you go to office hours. Final is 50% of grade, but identical to quizzes and labs so just study those and you're fine.

Lectures are really boring and kinda confusing... :( but he is the nicest professor I have ever had. I went to all his office hours for help on the lab (lol) and he was very patient to explain all the concepts to me! Quizzes every week! He is SUPER NICE! It's ok if you ask really stupid questions.

It was his first time teaching a class and he handled it very well. Lectures were lengthy and full of puns and anecdotes about technology, which made them mostly bearable. Quizzes and HW was replicated on the exams. Final was 60% of the grade, but was identical to quizzes. Veenstra was helpful and kind. I now know all about how to set up routers.
He was a good teacher but lectures were boring only really need to go on quiz days. I most of the time left lectures early.
Kerry was an awesome professor! You do a quiz and a lab every week. You should be good on the quizzes if you do the lab. I hope continues teaching, seems like he really enjoys it.
